title: 雕塑-卡牌大师逆命
author: 散落一地的
txt_content:
背景故事
Twisted Fate is an infamous card sharp and swindler who has gambled and charmed his way across much of the known world, earning the enmity and admiration of the rich and foolish alike. He rarely takes things seriously, greeting each day with a mocking smile and an insouciant swagger. In every possible way, Twisted Fate always has an ace up his sleeve.(LOLWIKI)
逆命是个臭名昭著的赌徒和骗子，他透过赌博走过了世界上大多数的地方，也赢得了不少敌意和敬意。他很少认真看待事情，以嘲讽的微笑和漫不经心的态度面对每一天。不论处于什么状况，逆命手中总是留着一张王牌。（摘自LOL台服逆命背景故事）







下载:Lady luck is smilin'.

replies.author: asjkdaskljda
replies.txt_content: 天啊你这是在侮辱卡牌

replies.author: Davv
replies.txt_content: 看不下去了   你是在侮辱卡牌
